text: gosport borough close in on a takeover by a locally-based consortium following financial uncertainty .

documents.title: care home firm fined for choking death
text: a company which runs a hampshire care home where an elderly woman choked to death on a meatball is fined £ 80,000 .

text: charity cash stolen during weymouth pub break-in

documents.title: vendee globe : alex thomson starts around the world race
text: sailor alex thomson has begun his attempt to become the first british winner of the vendee globe .
the challenge is seen as one of the most gruelling sporting events , sailing alone for 30,000 miles , non-stop and unaided around the world .

documents.title: weather outlook : frost and fog patches
text: a scattering of showers are expected towards the west of the region overnight .
elsewhere it will be dry with clear periods .
it will turning frosty with a few fog patches forming by the morning .
lows of about 1c ( 33f ) .
frost and fog will lift to leave bright spells and isolated showers tomorrow .
however , cloud will thicken from the west towards lunchtime , introducing increasingly wet and windy weather during the afternoon .
highs of about 7c ( 44f ) .
for a full 10-day forecast , visit the bbc weather site .

documents.title: isle of wight festival
text: isle of wight festival

documents.title: teenage boy arrested after man suffers 'life-changing ' injuries
text: a teenage boy has been arrested after a man suffered 'life-changing ' injuries to his eye .
police are investigating an assault in bournemouth in september where a man was walking with three men through the lower gardens near exeter road and were approached by a group of teenagers .
one of the group allegedly struck the victim with a studded belt which was wrapped around his fist .
the victim , aged in his 30s , sustained life-changing injuries to his right eye .
a 16-year-old boy from christchurch has been arrested on sus of causing grievous bodily harm with intent and bailed until the middle of january 2017 .

documents.title: new memorial to sailors lost at sea set to be unveiled
text: new memorial to sailors lost at sea set to be unveiled

documents.title: search under way for missing person
text: an `` extensive search '' is under way for a missing person off the coast of hampshire .

documents.title: isle of wight festival act fees 'have increased dramatically because of brexit '
text: the fees paid to acts at the isle of wight festival `` have increased dramatically '' since the brexit vote , organiser john giddings has said .
everything 's tough in every business with brexit .

when i pay someone millions of dollars , it now costs me millions of pounds the fees have changed dramatically since [ the eu referendum ] happened in june and i just have to be very careful about it because it costs so much more money and i ca n't increase the ticket price , because i do n't want to go over £ 200 .

documents.title: study 'reveals most dangerous rip currents '
text: researchers in southampton and plymouth say rip currents are often more dangerous where there are no waves breaking across the rip channel .
the study found that so-called `` open rips '' sent drifters further out to sea , and were twice as likely to feature in rnli rescue statistics as `` closed rips '' .
associate professor ivan haigh , from the university of southampton , said they were `` a much greater hazard to swimmers . ''

documents.title: single-parent families hit by benefits cap
text: a cut in the benefits cap - a limit on the income working age households can receive in certain benefits - has come into force .
the cap has been reduced from £ 26,000 a year to £ 20,000 a year , outside greater london .
government figures show that in southampton , one of the most-capped areas , 72 single-parent families were under the benefit cap in august .
single mothers and fathers make up two-thirds of capped households , according to the department for work and pensions .

documents.title: man critically injured in bridge fall
text: a man is in a `` life-threatening '' condition after apparently falling from a road bridge in basingstoke .
police were called to ringway west near worting road bridge at 12:51 gmt .
the incident is not being treated as sus
in september , a pedestrian was critically injured when he was pushed off the bridge onto the road below as the result of a traffic accident .

documents.title: beach carcass is 'harbour porpoise '
text: a dead marine mammal found washed up on compton beach has been identified as a harbour porpoise , by the charity whale and dolphin conservation .
porpoises are the most commonly-stranded cetaceans in the uk , with the latest figures showing 336 were reported in 2014 .
common causes of death include attack by bottlenose dolphins , entanglement in fishing gear and disease .
mark hitchcock , who found the 4ft-long ( 1.2m ) carcass on sunday , said it was undamaged .

text: trader caught selling outlawed ivory worth £ 9,000

documents.title: watch : holiday park fire destroys caravan
text: the blaze completely destroyed the static caravan at the parkdean holiday park on hayling island on sunday night .
one man was taken to hospital suffering from the effects of inhaling smoke but his condition is unknown .
video shows devastation after hayling caravan park blaze

documents.title: 'extensive search ' for missing person off hampshire
text: an `` extensive search '' is continuing for a missing person off hampshire , the coastguard has said .
it follows reports of a missing person in the keyhaven area , near hurst castle , at about 10:30 .

lymington and southampton coastguard rescue teams , lymington , calshot and mudeford rnli lifeboats and the uk coastguard search and rescue helicopter based at lee-on-solent are on scene carrying out an extensive shoreline , sea and air search .
the hampshire marine police have also joined the search .
we have no further information at this stage .

documents.title: breakingsearch under way for missing person in the solent
text: a search is under way for a missing person at hurst castle in the solent .
hampshire constabulary said it was called by the coastguard just after 10:30 , following reports of a missing person .
the force has not given any further information and the coastguard said the incident was `` ongoing '' .

documents.title: 'dangerous ' sparklers removed from beach
text: volunteers say they up hundreds of used sparklers which were lying buried in the sand on weymouth beach following saturday 's civic fireworks display .
the group cleared more than 10 bags of rubbish yesterday .
volunteer linda stevenson said : `` the sharp points extended out at angles which children could easily have fallen on . ''

text: eastleigh were held to a 1-1 draw against league 1 swindon on friday .
the match was featured on bbc2 , as the spitfires looked to repeat last year 's cup heroics .
you can watch the highlights below .

documents.title: 'dolphin calf ' washed up on isle of wight
text: the carcass of a `` dolphin calf '' washed up on compton beach yesterday .
mark hitchcock , who identified the find , said the 4ft ( 1.2m ) carcass was not decomposed and was being examined by an official or scientist .
he said : `` it was a shocker .
it was a shame because the body seemed so perfect . ''

documents.title: howe baffled by sudden goal-drought
text: howe baffled by sudden goal-drought

documents.title: teen 'overwhelmed ' over viral 'john lewis ' ad
text: a bournemouth student who posted a john lewis-style christmas advertisement says he is `` overwhelmed '' by the worldwide reaction to his video .
nick jablonka posted his a-level coursework titled `` john lewis christmas advert '' 2016 - the snowglobe in june .
the 18-year-old student said initially it got about 200 views , `` but in the past week it went crazy '' - it currently has more than 460,000 views .
john lewis said it was so impressed it was arranging for mr jablonka to spend some time with its advert team .

text: dan downs with the latest forecast

documents.title: robbie williams to entertain southampton
text: robbie williams has announced a huge uk tour for next summer which will stop off in southampton .
the former take that star , will play at st mary 's stadium on june 6 .
williams ' tour will take place at the same time as take that hit the road for a series of stadium shows .

documents.title: weather : dry and chilly
text: most areas will have a dry day with some sunshine .
it will remain chilly , although feeling less cold than yesterday given the lighter northerly wind .
a scattering of showers may affect western areas overnight , as temperatures drop to freezing .
elsewhere it will be dry although a few fog patches are expected by the morning .

documents.title: one person in hospital after hayling caravan fire
text: a person has been taken to hospital suffering from smoke inhalation after a fire in a caravan on hayling island .
the fire broke out in the caravan on sunday in manor road at the parkdean holiday park .
several fire crews were called to the blaze shortly after 21:15 gmt .
residents in surrounding caravans had to be led to safety while crews cooled down a number of gas cylinders .

documents.title: good morning
text: welcome to bbc local live for dorset , hampshire and the isle of wight .
we 'll be bringing you the latest news from across the three counties .
you can get in touch by email , on our hampshire and dorset facebook pages or on twitter @ bbc hampshire and @ bbcdorset .
